Nikita is awesome

```{r}
DataIneed<-
  ScorecardSmall%>%
  select(CONTROL, ADM_RATE, NPT41_PUB, NPT43_PUB, NPT45_PUB, NPT41_PUB, NPT43_PUB, NPT45_PUB)%>%
  gather(key=quintile, value = Netcost, NPT41_PUB, NPT43_PUB, NPT45_PUB, NPT41_PUB, NPT43_PUB, NPT45_PUB,na.rm=TRUE)%>%
  left_join(translations, by=c(quintile = "long_name"))
ggplot(DataIneed,aes(x=ADM_RATE,y=Netcost))+
  geom_point()+
  facet_grid(CONTROL~short_name)+
  geom_smooth()
  

```
